title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1245.5 - Tow away charge
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1245.5 - Tow away charge

State Regulations

Charge for towing vehicles parked in violation of posted
signs... $50 per vehicle (in addition to storage charges)

Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
